Human.Description: Human liver single-cell RNA-seq data - READY TO USE

Integrated.Description: Cross-species integrated dataset (9.2GB) - Can be downloaded later if needed
Integrated.Message: This large dataset is optional. The application works perfectly with the 3 individual species datasets above.
